info.name: inspector
info.description: The qooxdoo inspector is a tool designed to help debugging qooxdoo applications.  It consists of four seperate windows, (1) a javascript shell; (2) the object finder which shows a table of all qooxdoo objects; (3) the widget finder which shows a tree structure of the ui; (4) the property editor which shows all properties of the current selected object.

authors.name: Martin Wittemann (martinwittemann)
